lcap-h5-tk-share/value.description: The value that needs to be passed in

lcap-h5-tk-share/secret.description: Secret key, letters or numbers, please leave it blank if not used

lcap-h5-tk-share/shareUrl.description: Share address (default is current page address)

lcap-h5-tk-share/shareTitle.description: Title of WeChat Moments (default is the title of the current page)

lcap-h5-tk-share/shareBitmap.description: The URL of the shared image (too large or inaccessible will cause failure)
